properties.text: To start the game over, say 'Start Over' at any time.
Here is what you can do:
Here is the full set of instructions.
To start the game over, you can say 'Start Over' at any time.
If you want me to repeat the question, just say 'Repeat',
If you're experiencing issues with the correct answer recognition, please answer just using the letter choice.
To exit the quiz at any time, use the words 'Stop' or 'Cancel'.
To repeat the question just say 'Repeat'.
